name: Ticky Tacky Toe
description:
Ticky Tacky Toe is a reimagining of the classic paper-and-pencil game Tic Tac Toe! After picking a symbol (X or O) players take turns placing their symbols on the board. The aim is to be the first player to get three of their symbols in a line (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally).

Ticky Tacky Toe boasts three different playing modes to suit players of any age or skill level: face-off against a computer opponent in Quick Play, try your hand against your friends and family in Multiplayer, or test your speed and reflexes against the clock in Panic Mode.

GAMEPLAY

Ticky Tacky Toe is devilishly simpe to play: after choosing the starting symbol, simply tap on any vacant aquare on the board to place your symbol. If you get stuck, you can restart the game at any time.

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screen within the game.

FEATURES

  • A fantastically fun, family-friendly puzzle game!
  • Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
  • Three challenging playing modes to master!
  • Simple, elegant game board design!
  • Bright and bubbly background tunes!
  • Suitable for players of all ages!
